Writing apps to actuate in the SDK is not too difficult. The following tutorials perform actuation:

tutorial/code node used description example name in sdk
flash bulbs bulbsout this tutorial takes you through a simple flow that turns a light on and off every second databox.tutorial-on-off
just code bulbsout, sensingkit, dbfunction this turns a light on or off when a mobile phone/tablet is shaken vigorously databox.tutorial-shake-light
just code bulbsout, dbfunction turns three lights on/off in a repeating binary sequence databox.tutorial-hue-binary
